title: [PCDVD] The Incredible Hulk 2008.iso
description:
. Game Information
 
       Release Date...: 06/11/2008           Discs........: 1
       Game Type......: Action               Protection...: Safedisc
       Image Type.....: .mdf/.mds            Archive Type.: .rar
   
   
       . Game Summary
  
       Fueled with fury, he Incredible Hulk features key moments from
       the film, as well as additional plotlines and characters from the
       character&#039;s rich comic-book universe. Players smash through New
       York City, battling gigantic enemies amidst soaring skyscrapers
       in a massive open world. Players can demolish anything in their
       path and also use it as a weapon -- pieces of a crumbling
       buildingÃƒÂ a passing carÃƒÂ a light standard. They can even demolish
       buildings with their bare hands. Damage is persistent, and gamers
       can use it to gain access to previously unreachable areas.


       .Installation Notes

       1. Install Blindwrite 6.
       2. Open Blindwrite 6.
       3. Go to tab "Write".
       4. Insert a empty DVDR+R in your dvd writer.
       5. Select at source the pro-ihulk.b6t file.
       6. Set destination to your dvd-writer with the empty dvdr+r mounted.
       7. Set profile to "Bad Sectors"
       8. Click write.
       9. When writing done click no to delete image file.
       10. Uninstall ALL applications like Deamon Tools, Daemon Tools Pro,
           Alcohol.
       11. Make sure blindwrite is open and installed. (Just need to be opened)
       12. Insert the burned Incredible Hulk dvd.
       13. Install game
       14. Play!

       On some computers mounting in a vIDE drive with d-tools pro
       will also functionate.
